description: This file contains CSS styles for theme management and general layout for a Tic Tac Toe frontend application. It defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, styling for the main app component and its elements, including the theme toggle button and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text and responsive background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application with pointer events disabled.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component for the application with flexible layout and background color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button to toggle the theme with hover and active states.
